ref: 14737 márīci [In MIA. there may have been contamina- tion of mr̥gá -- with márīci -- : cf. mriga -- in Aś., *mirga<-> in WPah., *mriṅga -- in Phal. ~ Pk. mirīi -- < márīci -- . Thus orig. *marīcitr̥ṣṇā -- ʻ thirst for (what is in fact) rays ʼ (~ marīcipá -- VS.) > *mirīiaṇhā -- from which hyper -- Sk. mr̥gatr̥ṣṇikā -- : cf. late mr̥gatōya -- ~ marīcitōya -- BhP. (J. C. W.)]
